line.comment: * hot-drops loner pirates near freighter targets
* keep moving until you find a safe sector
* $index = get index of $follower in array $followers offset=0
* remove element from array $followers at index $index
* recruit a loner pirate from the field
* maybe respray to get rid of high bounties
* avoid hot-dropping near your homebase or close to abandoned Xenon areas

sval.val: hot-drops loner pirates near freighter targets
keep moving until you find a safe sector
$index = get index of $follower in array $followers offset=0
remove element from array $followers at index $index
recruit a loner pirate from the field
maybe respray to get rid of high bounties
avoid hot-dropping near your homebase or close to abandoned Xenon areas
